website_summaries.verdict: The perfect detox supplement to take after a sugar binge.
pros: We found that after consuming too much sugar the day before, the Complete Detox pills helped us avoid the negative effects of a sugar crash, such as headaches, mood swings, and bloating
They also speed up weight loss and boost immunity
We loved that the pill was small and easy to swallow with no harsh aftertaste
cons: There was some intense cramping on the first day

customer_reviews.title: Definitely detoxs
customer_reviews.text: I took the pills as directed and let me tell you that a few hours later I got awful pains in my stomach and had to run to the bathroom. It has been 24 hours and I haven’t been able to eat anything since taking this as everything runs right through you. Not even water. But it works so 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would like a bottle of the same green pills received in the sample packet.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product because of a sample that I received when I brought the pm formula. The sample capsules were green and worked the same day I that took them. I was so excited that I placed an order for a bottle. To my disappointment the pills I received are not the same as the sample pack (smaller and white )but I took them as directed. This is day four and still no results. I have called the company several times but continue to get sent to voicemail and left two messages. I would like to purchase a bottle of the same sample pills if possible. I will continue trying to get through to customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Hines

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: This detox formula is gentle and through. Made me feel less bloated and energetic.
customer_reviews.author: jjmcw

customer_reviews.title: Feeling better without breaking the bank
customer_reviews.text: I used this product in conjunction with other detox and cleanse supplements. I am sleeping better, less fuzzy thoughts, less cravings, and lower appetite (was always hungry/snacky prior). I cannot say which product produced these results, but am pleased nonetheless. The formulation included all the supplements that I have read are best for full body detox. Other detox supplements are much more pricey, but this is just right.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Dickey

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, You can feel results in short time
customer_reviews.text: Great Product, You can feel results in short time. I have ordered this product several times now and will always keep a bottle in the medicine cabinet. Highly recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Robert H.

customer_reviews.title: It is weird but I start felling crams in the ...
customer_reviews.text: It is weird but I started felling crams in the stomach and have more bloating as I started taking the pills. I would, also, appreciate, to have any customer support and instructions for how many days I supposed to take the pills to have results.
customer_reviews.author: S. B.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I saw the reviews and needed this for my fitness journey. I workout daily. And needed that extra umph to help shred unneeded weight. Surprisingly 15 days in, I felt no difference in energy or well being. Now I didn’t expect this to be a life changer but did expect better results. It became harder to use the restroom and after completing the detox. I actually gained weight. Maybe I took it wrong or expected too much?!
customer_reviews.author: JavMo

customer_reviews.title: cleared me out
customer_reviews.text: love this product.. I have been taken for a month now and can defintely tell a difference with my body. My only warning is if you plan on eating something bad/really greasy that day.. just know u will be on the toilet multiple times throughout the day afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great Results
customer_reviews.text: Having gone through 2 surgeries in just 5 weeks, the cleanse was great and I feel back to normal. I also feel great to get all the toxins out of my body!
customer_reviews.author: BRS

customer_reviews.title: It works!  My wife and I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product over the last few months and I love and endorse it! It has helped me lose 20 lbs making me feel better and be more productive! My wife has begun using it and she loves it too. We are trying more of their products!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy L. Crow

customer_reviews.title: I am happy to report
customer_reviews.text: This stuff actually works!!!!! I am happy to report! Sure its not fun sucking 3 of this pills, but the end results are great! I even lost some weight with them (nothing crazy but a few pounds at least). But it keeps your digestive system running at peak performance!
customer_reviews.author: James K Shafer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Really felt effects of the product in a good way.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Stilwell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Detoxing is complicated. Complete Detox takes some of the annoyance out of a very unpleasant process.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett C. Swaim

customer_reviews.title: Recommend it. You will also think so
customer_reviews.text: I try it and it feel well. Recommend it. You will also think so.
customer_reviews.author: Youki

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This product has tremendously helped with my regularity! Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Its good but not as great the benefits as promised.
customer_reviews.author: ImranG

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: One of the best detox i ever trie very very good
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo garcia

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. It helped me loose weight, feel better, and have more energy. I already ordered a second bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Oana

customer_reviews.title: This detox works
customer_reviews.text: Your detox work great, my skin is clearing up like crazy. I will recommend this detox tto all my friends. Thank so much for your product
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Caused extreme diarrhea and acne
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this product. After taking it for 14 days I stopped. It caused extreme diarrhea all day long. After 4 days of taking it I started to get cystic acne all over my trunk and face and neck. I haven’t acne in a few years! I have done quite a few detoxes and cleanses and this one was the most uncomfortable. I will not buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Kami R Tuttle

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: I have used many detoxes and this one is by far the best out there. My bloating and stomach aches after eating is gone, lost a few pounds also. This is gentle also. I am happy!
customer_reviews.author: debwrn

customer_reviews.title: Be prepared to spend quality time on the porcelain throne ...
customer_reviews.text: Be prepared to spend quality time on the porcelain throne. This is an effective product. Coupled with the Detox PM, your sphincter has no hope of hiding. Be warned that after you take it, within the hour do not trust a fart.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Garner

customer_reviews.title: Is it working?
customer_reviews.text: While I’ve had no cramps or problems with this product, I can’t say it seems like it’s detoxing anything. No instructions on changing diet which surprised me considering it is supposed to be a whole body detox. It does however, seem to have an added benefit to reducing my appetite. Just not as hungry when taking them. No weight lose as others have suggested.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Initially sceptical about it.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know how it works initally. But now it surely does and I'm really happy with the result. My stomach began to shrink and I feel much lighter after taking it for about 1 week. Sometimes I think the ingredients are so natural that's why I'm getting better result day by day.
customer_reviews.author: Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: detox pill that works
customer_reviews.text: I've been taking these for a couple of weeks and they've definitely improved my digestion. There a standard size pill and not too difficult to swallow. I also appreciate that I only have to take them once a day with a meal rather than trying to remember an hour before eating and several times a day like many other dietary supplements.
customer_reviews.author: Sereen

customer_reviews.title: Easy to swallow and did not leave any after taste ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to swallow and did not leave any after taste or upset stomach. Works as describe. No issues at all.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha Reeve

customer_reviews.title: It's Ok.
customer_reviews.text: It's okay it seemed like it worked at First and now it's not working at all two months in
customer_reviews.author: Tatum

customer_reviews.title: Highly recomend
customer_reviews.text: This product works great i have lost weight and my bowl movents have returned to normal
customer_reviews.author: Robert julick

customer_reviews.title: Didn't like it very much
customer_reviews.text: Strong burning sensation in my stomach from this. Didn't like it very much myself
customer_reviews.author: vincent verstraete

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews before purchasing and honestly I believe I got the wrong product. Been using it for three days now and there had been no movement what's so ever. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work well. Definitely felt more energetic after taking.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: day 2
customer_reviews.text: Day two and ive gone 4 times today, im taking 3 in the morning and 3 at night as opposed to 3 ina day, but theyre definetely not duds
customer_reviews.author: jose plascencia

customer_reviews.title: I have been taking these for four days now and ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking these for four days now and do not see a change. I won't be purchasing this product again unless I see a significant change. Most of the reviews I saw say that the product worked within a day after taking it.
customer_reviews.author: Lee A.

customer_reviews.title: Detoxing??
customer_reviews.text: When I bought this product I really had high hopes. Not so sure if I'm too health or the product doesn't work. I saw no changes at all in regard to what I was expecting. I gave it 3 stars because I felt a little stronger after taking it.
customer_reviews.author: Obadiah

product_meta.title: Longevity Complete Detox [New Formula] - Rapid Whole Body Detox - 10 + Natural Herbs - Scientifically formulated & Most Recommended for Detox - 90 Capsules
feature_bullets: WHY DETOX? - Enhances overall wellness; - Supports digestive health; - Boosts immunity; - Elevates energy level; - Improves skin condition over time; - Defies allergy; - Facilitate weight loss by being healthier.

NATURAL DETOXIFICATION: - Proprietary formulation by experienced health practitioners; - Detoxifies your body and cleanse your system; - Precisely targets harmful toxins; - Rejuvenates Colon, Liver, Lymph & Kidney.

BEST QUALITY: - 100% natural ingredients; - Up to 10X more concentrated herbal efficacies; - No chemical substitutes used for real herbs; - Manufactured in an FDA registered facility; - GMP compliant; - GMO-free; - Nourishes your body with the right ingredients without extreme low-calorie fasting! - Recharges your health for both short and long term benefits!

BEST VALUE + FREE Ebook + 100 % SATISFACTION: - No need for special dieting; - No chemical additives; - No preservatives; - No artificial flavors; - Instead of selling these ingredients individually, you have everything in a bottle with the BEST VALUE! Free ebook with 10 day quick and easy detox plan. Love it or your money back within 60 days.
